headerDisplay:
*This is a temporary configuration schema for initial setup only. When the plugin runs it will replace this schema with one tailored to the available Home Connect appliances.*

*Update [homebridge-config-ui-x](https://github.com/oznu/homebridge-config-ui-x) to version 4.8.1 or later if this message remains after the Home Connect Client has been configured.*

For help please refer to the [README](https://github.com/marcodelfini/homebridge-arduino/blob/master/README.md) and [`config.json`](https://github.com/thoukydides/homebridge-homeconnect/wiki/config.json).

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory. It will be used as the accessory name in HomeKit.

serial-number.title: Serial Number
serial-number.description: A unique Serial Number. It's very important and will be used to generate di uuid. Each accessory must have it different.

accessory-type.title: Accessory Type
accessory-type.description: Types of Accessory: 0 Switch (default), 1 Lightbulb, 2 Outlet, 3 GarageDoorOpener, 4 Realy, 5 Fan, 6 TemperatureSensor, 7 Light Sensor, 8 Lock Mechanism, 9 Motion Sensor, 10 Leak Sensor, 11 Thermostat, 12 Valve

optional-charac1.title: Optional Characteristics 1
optional-charac1.description:
Optional Characteristics 1:
- LIGHTBULB: Brightness
- FAN: RotationDirection
- THERMOSTAT: deactive is Celsius (default), active is Fahrenheit
- VALVE: active duretion timer (default not), see also duretion setting

optional-charac2.title: Optional Characteristics 2
optional-charac2.description:
Optional Characteristics 2:
- LIGHTBULB: Hue
- FAN: RotationSpeed

host.title: Host
host.description: Arduino host, default is 127.0.0.1 (NO add http:// before, only the ip or domain name)

duration.title: Duration
duration.description:
Time in second (default is 0 not active):
- SWITCH: time to Toggle State (becomes a button)
- VALVE: time for Active State (opened), if this not setted (> 0) the active duretion timer (Optional Characteristics 1 flagged) not work

default-state.title: Default State
default-state.description: Default State (begin state, or return state if duration is setted)

logLevel.title: Loging level
logLevel.description:
Three different levels:
0: logging disabled
1: logs only HTTP errors (default)
2: logs each HTTP response
